Says No Alcohol on the front but the ingredients say benzyl alcohol! People look for no alcohol mouthwashes for various reasons - professions where breath analysis is a daily practise, pregnancy etc.. so why deceive people under the garb of ayurveda? Did not expect this from Himalaya, a trusted ayurveda brand.
